text: Pen nɨgɨnek, Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ñag lelak kumak tek olap jakɨl yek. Ne bɨnonɨm besɨg mɨdep abe, tap kɨm mɨdep omɨŋal omɨŋal anɨb okok abe nab sɨŋak yek. Pen bɨawl kuskus gɨl yelak. Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk anɨb ak mablod anep kugul ak, wɨdɨn anep kugul ak lak. Wɨdɨn anep kugul lak takaw jɨj ak, God Kawnan ne ak tam pakɨl anep kugul lup ak. Kawnan ne anɨb ak yokek, lum okok mɨdupsek kɨd kɨd amub.
